topic.title: Is it possible on ZeroNet to create a multiple user id? Thank you :)
topic.body: I would know if is it possible to create a different user id. I want to have multiple id for a different identity.

topic.title: How can i delete my blog in data file? How can i find it?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Buongiorno a tutti. Quanti italiani ci sono?

1558168145_17TtMnYrVFMh1z7Bvn8QYPUyJ4zL9.body:
> [leftside](#comment_770_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): duplicate zeronet folder and run zeronet in that folder. And then make another id.

Oh, good. Thank you my friend ;)

> [akiraforsaken](#comment_4_1DP9XK8Dt78S274fGkH7M6jhoQjmwQfEPK): move users.json file in zeronet data folder  to another folder and open zeronet to crete a id in new users.json file.

This method is good for a new user id, for change it no? Thank you man

> [anonymouslogin](#comment_306_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X): You can use multiuser plugin and run zeronet via --multiuser_local command. Firstly, you need to backup your users.json file from ZeroNet/data folder. You can login/switch accounts using master seeds from that file.

Wow, i will try. Thank you
